randomEmails.title: Welcome to Wecair University
randomEmails.unreadTitle: Welcome to Wecair University- Dear Students, Congrats on surviving this far and welcome to Wecair. Our community of exceptional students
randomEmails.readTitle: Welcome to Wecair University- Dear Students, Congrats on surviving this far and welcome to Wecair. Our community of exceptional students
randomEmails.content:
Dear Students,
Congrats on surviving this far and welcome to Wecair. Our community of exceptional students are changing the world, and at Wecair, you can too.
Sincerely, President
